Content_wSideColumn.Name: Media Transfer
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Media Transfer
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: Media Transfer deals with the streaming of videos, transferring them for videos to DVDs and student Book of Mormons.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
1. Media Transfer helps with academic projects. They are able to stream videos with which the school owns copyrights to, transfers videos to DVDs as well as put devotionals, forums, concerts, etc. on a physical copy. They do not do personal projects for students or faculty. We deliver to media transfer, on the second floor of the BYU-Idaho Center because we are the only ones who are allowed access
  2. Media Transfer will charge individual and department accounts. We take deliveries from:
  • The BYU-I Bookstore- Students and faculty can order filmed campus events: Nashville Nights, Extravadance, etc. The bookstore will bring an order sheet stating who the order is for and what needs to be copied. We then take the sheet to media transfer where they make the copies. We then bring the finished product back to the bookstore secretary to have the order form signed.
  • Library- The library will bring movies to be streamed. We take the streaming request and the movie to media transfer. When finished we will pick up the movie and bring it to the circulation desk.
  • Media Transfer- Sometimes media transfer will have certain projects they will need to do . The library brings those videos to us and we will deliver and pick them up.
  • Individual Students- Students can come to us only if they need a Book of Mormon in a different language for their particular class. A duplication request will be filled out to take to media transfer, pick up, and call student to have them sign it.
